GeneDef.label: minor archite senses
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number archites in their brain that allow them to more easily process sensory information.\n\nDue to the nature of this gene, this is incompatible with most of the genes in the senses category.

GeneDef.label: archite senses
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their brain that allow them to more easily process sensory information.\n\nDue to the nature of this gene, this is incompatible with most of the genes in the senses category.

GeneDef.label: major archite senses
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number archites in their brain that allow them to more easily process sensory information.\n\nDue to the nature of this gene, this is incompatible with most of the genes in the senses category.

GeneDef.label: extreme archite senses
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of compressed archite clumps in their brain that allow them to more easily process sensory information.\n\nDue to the nature of this gene, this is incompatible with most of the genes in the senses category.

GeneDef.label: minor archite carry capacity
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites spread throughout their arms and back that increase their carry capacity.

GeneDef.label: archite carry capacity
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites spread throughout their arms and back that increase their carry capacity.

GeneDef.label: major archite carry capacity
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites spread throughout their arms and back that increase their carry capacity.

GeneDef.label: archite enhanced digestion
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their stomach that protect them from food poisoning and process raw foods with unbelievable efficiency.

GeneDef.label: minor archite hemo-processing efficiency
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their blood that allow them to process the blood of others into hemogen unbelievably efficiently.

GeneDef.label: archite hemo-processing efficiency
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their blood that allow them to process the blood of others into hemogen unbelievably efficiently.

GeneDef.label: major archite hemo-processing efficiency
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their blood that allow them to process the blood of others into hemogen unbelievably efficiently.

GeneDef.label: archite mental fortitude
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their brains that help defend their mind from being unsettled by outside influences. This will make it much less likely for them to have a mental break. For those who have Ideology, this also makes it much harder to keep them suppressed and change their beliefs.

GeneDef.label: minor archite enhanced burrowing
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their brain dedicated to helping them mine more efficiently.\n\nThis enhancement will not impact how much they get from mining, only the speed at which they do it. This will impact both normal mining and deep drilling.

GeneDef.label: archite enhanced burrowing
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their brain dedicated to helping them mine more efficiently.\n\nThis enhancement will not impact how much they get from mining, only the speed at which they do it. This will impact both normal mining and deep drilling.

GeneDef.label: major archite enhanced burrowing
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their brain dedicated to helping them mine more efficiently.\n\nThis enhancement will not impact how much they get from mining, only the speed at which they do it. This will impact both normal mining and deep drilling.

GeneDef.label: minor archite enhanced caring
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their brain dedicated to helping them figure out what is wrong with a person much faster than normal.\n\nThis instinct will not help them with more complex operations, nor will it help them know how to tend the individual well.

GeneDef.label: archite enhanced caring
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their brain dedicated to helping them figure out what is wrong with a person much faster than normal.\n\nThis instinct will not help them with more complex operations, nor will it help them know how to tend the individual well.

GeneDef.label: major archite enhanced caring
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their brain dedicated to helping them figure out what is wrong with a person much faster than normal.\n\nThis instinct will not help them with more complex operations, nor will it help them know how to tend the individual well.

GeneDef.label: minor archite enhanced construction
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their brain dedicated to helping them build structures a lot faster than normal to protect themselves from outside dangers.\n\nThis instinct will not help them avoid failure while building, just accelerate the rate that they build.

GeneDef.label: archite enhanced construction
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their brain dedicated to helping them build structures a lot faster than normal to protect themselves from outside dangers.\n\nThis instinct will not help them avoid failure while building, just accelerate the rate that they build.

GeneDef.label: major archite enhanced construction
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their brain dedicated to helping them build structures a lot faster than normal to protect themselves from outside dangers.\n\nThis instinct will not help them avoid failure while building, just accelerate the rate that they build.

GeneDef.label: minor archite enhanced curiosity
GeneDef.description:
Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their brain dedicated to helping them discoverer concepts that were previously unknown, increasing their research speed by a little bit.

This will not impact their learning rate, just the rate that they research things.

For more options involving the rate a pawn learns, take a look at More Study Genes. You can use those to alter how well a pawn can better themselves.

GeneDef.label: archite enhanced curiosity
GeneDef.description:
Carriers of this gene have archites in their brain dedicated to helping them discoverer concepts that were previously unknown, increasing their research speed by a little bit.

This will not impact their learning rate, just the rate that they research things.

For more options involving the rate a pawn learns, take a look at More Study Genes. You can use those to alter how well a pawn can better themselves.

GeneDef.label: major archite enhanced curiosity
GeneDef.description:
Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their brain dedicated to helping them discoverer concepts that were previously unknown, increasing their research speed by a little bit.

This will not impact their learning rate, just the rate that they research things.

For more options involving the rate a pawn learns, take a look at More Study Genes. You can use those to alter how well a pawn can better themselves.

GeneDef.label: minor archite enhanced foraging
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their brain dedicated to helping them plant and harvest plants a lot faster than most.\n\nThis instinct will not help them get more from the plants, just help them gather the materials faster.

GeneDef.label: archite enhanced foraging
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their brain dedicated to helping them plant and harvest plants a lot faster than most.\n\nThis instinct will not help them get more from the plants, just help them gather the materials faster.

GeneDef.label: major archite enhanced foraging
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their brain dedicated to helping them plant and harvest plants a lot faster than most.\n\nThis instinct will not help them get more from the plants, just help them gather the materials faster.

GeneDef.label: minor archite enhanced herding
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their brain dedicated to helping them harvest materials from animals a little faster than most.\n\nThis instinct will not help them gather more materials from animals, just accelerate the rate that they can get materials.

GeneDef.label: archite enhanced herding
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their brain dedicated to helping them harvest materials from animals a little faster than most.\n\nThis instinct will not help them gather more materials from animals, just accelerate the rate that they can get materials.

GeneDef.label: major archite enhanced herding
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their brain dedicated to helping them harvest materials from animals a little faster than most.\n\nThis instinct will not help them gather more materials from animals, just accelerate the rate that they can get materials.

GeneDef.label: minor archite enhanced hunting
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their brain dedicated to helping them hunt animals without being noticed a little more easily than normal.

GeneDef.label: archite enhanced hunting
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their brain dedicated to helping them hunt animals without being noticed a little more easily than normal.

GeneDef.label: major archite enhanced hunting
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their brain dedicated to helping them hunt animals without being noticed a little more easily than normal.

GeneDef.label: minor archite enhanced convincing
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their brains dedicated to making them a lot more convincing compared to most people. They have an easier time convincing others to join their side.

GeneDef.label: archite enhanced convincing
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their brains dedicated to making them a lot more convincing compared to most people. They have an easier time convincing others to join their side.

GeneDef.label: major archite enhanced convincing
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their brains dedicated to making them a lot more convincing compared to most people. They have an easier time convincing others to join their side.

GeneDef.label: minor archite enhanced suave
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their brains dedicated to making them a lot more suave compared to most people. This helps them keep others interested in what you're talking about.\n\nThis has a trade price improvement that is so high it can cause weird issues later in the game.

GeneDef.label: archite enhanced suave
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their brains dedicated to making them a lot more suave compared to most people. This helps them keep others interested in what you're talking about.\n\nThis has a trade price improvement that is so high it can cause weird issues later in the game.

GeneDef.label: major archite enhanced suave
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their brains dedicated to making them a lot more suave compared to most people. This helps them keep others interested in what you're talking about.\n\nThis has a trade price improvement that is so high it can cause weird issues later in the game.

GeneDef.label: minor archite enhanced terrifying
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their brains dedicated to making them a lot more terrifying compared to most people. They are more likely to be able to keep others in line when the need arises.

GeneDef.label: archite enhanced terrifying
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their brains dedicated to making them a lot more terrifying compared to most people. They are more likely to be able to keep others in line when the need arises.

GeneDef.label: major archite enhanced terrifying
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their brains dedicated to making them a lot more terrifying compared to most people. They are more likely to be able to keep others in line when the need arises.

GeneDef.label: archite enchantment
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in system that make it exceptionally easy to seduce others. The archites in their system prevent others with archite enchantment from influencing them, though it does nothing to stop enchanting pawns from influencing them.

GeneDef.label: minor archite enhanced brawling
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their bodies dedicated to making them a much better brawler compared to most people. This helps them fight enemies in melee combat by making them more accurate and evasive.

GeneDef.label: archite enhanced brawling
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their bodies dedicated to making them a much better brawler compared to most people. This helps them fight enemies in melee combat by making them more accurate and evasive.

GeneDef.label: major archite enhanced brawling
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their bodies dedicated to making them a much better brawler compared to most people. This helps them fight enemies in melee combat by making them more accurate and evasive.

GeneDef.label: minor archite enhanced shooting
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their brains dedicated to making them a much better shooter compared to most people. This helps them snipe enemies in melee combat by making them more accurate and evasive.

GeneDef.label: archite enhanced shooting
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their brains dedicated to making them a much better shooter compared to most people. This helps them snipe enemies in melee combat by making them more accurate and evasive.

GeneDef.label: major archite enhanced shooting
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their brains dedicated to making them a much better shooter compared to most people. This helps them snipe enemies in melee combat by making them more accurate and evasive.

GeneDef.label: minor elemental protection
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their body dedicated to protecting them from various types of elemental damage. The number of items on this list may increase based on what mods you have enabled.

GeneDef.label: elemental protection
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their body dedicated to protecting them from various types of elemental damage. The number of items on this list may increase based on what mods you have enabled.

GeneDef.label: elemental Immunity
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number archites in their body dedicated to protecting them from various types of elemental damage. The number of items on this list may increase based on what mods you have enabled.\n\nThis does NOT render a pawn immune to all damage. Bullets and blades can still kill the pawn, along with certain types of damages that were intentionally excluded from the list.

GeneDef.label: archite psychic influencer
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have an innate psychic reader, harmonizer, and shield. The shield protects them from most external mood and opinion altering psychic effect. Unlike Psychic insulation, this only stops both negative moods and dynamic moods(like a harmonizer and drones).

customEffectDescriptions.li: Colonist will not be effected by external psychic thought and opinion changers.
Colonist will still be effected by other effects of psychic abilties, even if those abilities include a thought or opinion change.
The harmonizer and bond break moods look strange on the list because they don't have a source. This is just a visual bug caused by the base game's naming structure.

GeneDef.label: minor archite enhanced entropy max
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their bodies dedicated to helping them avoid suffering damage from storing large amounts of neural heat.

GeneDef.label: archite enhanced entropy max
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their bodies dedicated to helping them avoid suffering damage from storing large amounts of neural heat.

GeneDef.label: major archite enhanced entropy max
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their bodies dedicated to helping them avoid suffering damage from storing large amounts of neural heat.

GeneDef.label: minor archite enhanced entropy recovery
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their bodies dedicated to helping them dissipate neural heat.

GeneDef.label: archite enhanced entropy recovery
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their bodies dedicated to helping them dissipate neural heat.

GeneDef.label: major archite enhanced entropy recovery
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their bodies dedicated to helping them dissipate neural heat.

GeneDef.label: minor archite enhanced focus gain
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their brains dedicated to helping them clear their minds and gain more focus while meditating.

GeneDef.label: archite enhanced focus gain
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their brains dedicated to helping them clear their minds and gain more focus while meditating.

GeneDef.label: major archite enhanced focus gain
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their brains dedicated to helping them clear their minds and gain more focus while meditating.

li.label: Archite Psychic Influencer removes Psychic Bond Torn mood:

GeneDef.label: minor archite enhanced remote shielding
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their brains dedicated to increasing the range at which the pawn can shield distant mechanoids, along with increasing the amount of energy the shield has.

GeneDef.label: archite enhanced remote shielding
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their brains dedicated to increasing the range at which the pawn can shield distant mechanoids, along with increasing the amount of energy the shield has.

GeneDef.label: major archite enhanced remote shielding
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their brains dedicated to increasing the range at which the pawn can shield distant mechanoids, along with increasing the amount of energy the shield has.

GeneDef.label: minor archite enhanced remote repairing
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their brains dedicated to increasing the range at which the pawn can repair distant mechanoids.

GeneDef.label: archite enhanced remote repairing
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their brains dedicated to increasing the range at which the pawn can repair distant mechanoids.

GeneDef.label: major archite enhanced remote repairing
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their brains dedicated to increasing the range at which the pawn can repair distant mechanoids.

GeneDef.label: minor archite enhanced mech repair speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their bodies dedicated to helping the pawn focus a mechanoid's energy to repairing faster.\n\nThis will not change the total amount of energy required for repairing.

GeneDef.label: archite enhanced mech repair speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their bodies dedicated to helping the pawn focus a mechanoid's energy to repairing faster.\n\nThis will not change the total amount of energy required for repairing.

GeneDef.label: major archite enhanced mech repair speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their bodies dedicated to helping the pawn focus a mechanoid's energy to repairing faster.\n\nThis will not change the total amount of energy required for repairing.

GeneDef.label: minor archite enhanced mech control
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their brains dedicated to helping them control more mechanoids at the same time.

GeneDef.label: archite enhanced mech control
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their brains dedicated to helping them control more mechanoids at the same time.

GeneDef.label: major archite enhanced mech control
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their brains dedicated to helping them control more mechanoids at the same time.

GeneDef.label: minor archite enhanced mech gestation speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their bodies dedicated to helping the pawn direct mechanites used in mechanoid.

GeneDef.label: archite enhanced mech gestation speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their bodies dedicated to helping the pawn direct mechanites used in mechanoid.

GeneDef.label: major archite enhanced mech gestation speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their bodies dedicated to helping the pawn direct mechanites used in mechanoid.

GeneDef.label: minor archite enhanced encoding speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their brains dedicated to helping them encode new subcores quickly.\n\nThis normally only impacts the encoding rate of basic subcores, though other mods that add craftable subcores may utilize this speed as well.

GeneDef.label: archite enhanced encoding speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their brains dedicated to helping them encode new subcores quickly.\n\nThis normally only impacts the encoding rate of basic subcores, though other mods that add craftable subcores may utilize this speed as well.

GeneDef.label: major archite enhanced encoding speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their brains dedicated to helping them encode new subcores quickly.\n\nThis normally only impacts the encoding rate of basic subcores, though other mods that add craftable subcores may utilize this speed as well.

GeneDef.label: minor archite enhanced mech work speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites in their brains dedicated to increasing the work speed of all mechanoids under the carrier's control.

GeneDef.label: archite enhanced mech work speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites in their brains dedicated to increasing the work speed of all mechanoids under the carrier's control.

GeneDef.label: major archite enhanced mech work speed
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites in their brains dedicated to increasing the work speed of all mechanoids under the carrier's control.
